thread.title: West Ham vs West Brom: Andy Carroll set for England recall with Gareth Southgate watching in-form hitman
thread.title_full: West Ham vs West Brom: Andy Carroll set for England recall with Gareth Southgate watching in-form hitman

author: jgordon
title: West Ham vs West Brom: Andy Carroll set for England recall with Gareth Southgate watching in-form hitman
text:
LION IN WAIT West Ham vs West Brom: Andy Carroll set for England recall with Gareth Southgate watching in-form hitman 
Three Lions chief will check out Hammers striker who has scored four in as many games after battling injury all season By JAMIE GORDON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ANDY CARROLL will be playing for an England place when West Ham take on West Brom on Saturday . 
Three Lions chief Gareth Southgate will be there to watch the in-form hitman, according to the Daily Mail. Getty Images 3 Andy Carroll has hit form after struggling with injuries through the first half of the season 
Target man Carroll, 28, is expected to lead the line after bagging four goals in as many games. 
Keep up to date with ALL the West Ham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
He scored in the 3-1 win over Southampton last weekend before picking up a minor groin injury but is involved in full training. 
The Hammers have risen to ninth despite the sale of last season’s hero Dimitri Payet, following his decision to go on strike. Related Stories New Era Andy Carroll warns Dimitri Payet he will not disrupt West Ham's spirit with demands to join Marseille happy hammers Middlesbrough 1 West Ham 3: Andy Carroll at the double to leave Boro just outside relegation zone OVAL OFFICE Gareth Southgate takes tips from Eddie Jones as England prepare for crunch Six Nations clash with Wales ONE TO WATCH Gareth Southgate and Neil Morrissey join Matt Baker and Michelle Ackerley on The One Show tonight RESULTS ARE IN Lionel Messi snubbed by Gareth Southgate and Wayne Rooney... here's how everyone voted in Fifa awards 
Southgate’s Lions play old foes Germany in a friendly next month before hosting Lithuania in a World Cup qualifier. 
The ex-Middlesbrough boss was pictured with the England rugby team as they prepare to face neighbours Wales this week. 
Powerhouse West Ham winger Michail Antonio will also be looking to make an impression and make the squad. PA:Press Association Gareth Southgate will check on Carroll’s form and fitness ahead of next month’s international break Southampton 1-3 West Ham : Hammers bounce back to beat Saints at St Mary's Getty Images 3 England boss Southgate takes in Eddie Jones' training session ahead of a huge clash in Cardiff 
Last week, Carroll insisted that he would have added to his nine England caps if he had not been plagued by injuries. 
He said: “Nine caps for England, there are more caps in me. I've always thought I could play for England if I am on my game — if I am fit." Middlesbrough 1-3 West Ham : Andy Carroll scores twice for Hammers
